description: Karen Yengibaryan, a 35-year-old man who helped rescue people from the Crocus concert hall tragedy, has died. He inhaled carbon monoxide and caught a severe cold after giving his jacket to a victim. Despite being hospitalized, his condition worsened, and he could not be saved.
original:
Today, one of the concerned passers-by who helped save people from Crocus died. Karen Yengibaryan inhaled carbon monoxide and caught a severe cold - because he gave his jacket to the victim.

35-year-old Karen worked in a company installing outdoor advertising and was not far from Crocus at the time of the tragedy. I saw smoke on the roof of the concert hall and ran to the main entrance. He pulled people out of the smoke, took them to doctors and went back. He gave his outer clothing to one of the victims. Karen returned home only in the morning.

As a result, the guy inhaled heavily from carbon monoxide and caught a cold - the temperature by the time the ambulance arrived was 38.5. Karen was hospitalized with a diagnosis of acute respiratory tract infection, and his condition worsened over the next few days. Unfortunately, it was not possible to save him.

Tomorrow a farewell to Karen will take place at the Armenian Temple Complex. The guy attended church, helped clean the temple and participated in the Liturgy.

event: Renewed Work of National Security and Defense Council of Ukraine
description: Ukraine's National Security and Defense Council has resumed its work, focusing on five key areas: enhancing predictability, continuing current tasks, doctrinal work, cyber security, and information protection. The council aims to strengthen Ukraine's national security and protect its society.
original:
Forwarded from: Zelenskiy / Official
We are starting the renewed work of the National Security and Defense Council of Ukraine.

The first is more predictability of this function. We need to strengthen Ukraine's ability to predict and influence the processes on which the national security of our state depends.

The second is the continuation of all current tasks of the NSDC system. And especially carefully - regarding the sanctions policy of our state.

The third is doctrinal work. Clarity of national guidelines and systematic implementation are what is needed both now and after the war.

The fourth is cyber security and information. The NSDC has the potential to do more to protect against hostile destabilization operations and coordinate all state institutions in this area.

And fifthly, the work of the Stavka, projects of decisions, control over the implementation of decisions - all this, of course, must be continued. The obvious priority is the defense of our state and the protection of our society.

Recently, live on Ukrainian TV, Danilov obscenely distorted the name of the special representative of China on Eurasia by Li Hui. Five days later he was fired. Probably, Zelensky’s supporters felt that the influence of the Moldovan media was not so significant in shaping the global agenda. description: UAC has patented a utility model for an air-launched drone that can be dropped from an airplane. The drone is designed to make decisions to strike and maintain contact with the carrier aircraft even after being dropped.
original:
Forwarded from: MASHNEWS | Industry News
UAC has patented a UAV that can be dropped from an airplane. The rights to a “utility model” of a UAV that can be dropped from an airplane have been posted on the Rospatent website. Moreover, the drone must be able to make a decision to strike. It is not known whether the technology exists in Russia to make this possible. In fact, the idea is patented.

Yesterday, March 28, a patent for a utility model of PJSC UAC (United Aircraft Corporation) was published on the website of the Federal Institute of Industrial Property. We are talking about an air-launched drone and the scheme for its use.

Air launch refers to the launch of a UAV from a combat aircraft. The drone that UAC writes about does not have specific characteristics described, from which we can conclude that either they are secret or the drone simply does not exist yet. Only the idea is patented - which developers would like to see it.

The essence of the work is that the drone moves with the aircraft at the suspension point, then, when approaching the line of combat contact (LCC), the UAV is dropped, but it does not lose contact with the carrier aircraft.
The plane, in turn, moves away from the LBS, ensuring its safety. Read more…

description: A unique burglary occurred in a sports store in Kragerø, Norway, where thieves stole 8 left-foot sneakers from brands New Balance and Merrell. The store owner believes the thieves only took what they could reach through a small window, leaving the right-foot sneakers in the sales area. The damage amounts to 12,000 crowns.
original:
And now to the news from the world of crime. A funny burglary occurred in one of the sports stores in the city of Kragerø in southern Norway. As a result, the store was short of 8 sneaker brands New Balance and Merrell.

No, you read correctly: not “pairs of sneakers,” but “sneakers.” The fact is that all the stolen shoes are on the left foot.

Why did the thieves want only the left sneakers? According to store owner Stian Størseth, they probably did not take into account the fact that in the warehouse where the intruders entered through the window, only one sneaker was stored in each of the boxes - and all the right ones were lying in the sales area, where the thieves could not get into. The reason is that the window they broke is so small that a person cannot climb through it. Therefore, apparently, they took only what they could reach through the window from the street. The damage amounted to 12,000 crowns - or, as Sörseth clarifies, 6,000 crowns, if you count only the left sneakers. Now he has every reason to believe that thieves may be coming for the right - and he says additional security measures need to be taken against them.

The girl's name is Olesya Potekhina (Khramoikina), she works at the Furry Angels foundation. On March 22, while the special services were working, she changed into a departmental uniform, and then introduced herself as the leader of the sniffer dogs of the mine-detecting and search-and-rescue group and went into Crocus.

After photographing the situation inside the concert hall, Olesya left. Soon she began asking subscribers to donate money, because the foundation’s dogs supposedly help rescuers at the scene of the tragedy. Petya the First. Subscribe

He is accused under paragraph “B” of Part 3 of Article 205 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (terrorist attack). He will soon be placed under arrest.

Lutfulloi is a native of the city of Bokhtar in western Tajikistan. The accused was detained on March 23 during a search for those involved in the terrorist attack. Two days later, a court in Moscow arrested him for 15 days. According to the case file, he used obscene language and resisted the police.

original:

description: Unmanned aerial vehicles have been widely used since 2022, solving various problems such as delivering provisions, remote mining, delivering medicines, evacuating wounded personnel, and providing fire missions for units. The use of drones is expected to expand, with plans to increase their capacity to carry heavier weapons.

Despite sanctions, Russia has doubled its imports of explosives, including nitrocellulose, used to produce explosives. Suppliers include companies from China, the USA, Germany, and Turkey, with some US-based companies actively advocating anti-Russian sanctions. The growth in imports was significant, with a 70% increase in 2022 and a total of 3039 tons by mid-2023, almost double the 2021 level.
original:
Despite the sanctions, Russia has doubled its imports of explosives, thanks in part to companies based in the United States.

The Wall Street Journal writes about this.

The publication reports that in 2023, Russia's imports of nitrocellulose, used to produce explosives, almost doubled the 2021 level.

According to him, suppliers of nitrocellulose to the Russian Federation include China, the USA, Germany and Turkey. Moreover, the increase in imports of explosives was also due to companies based in the States and other Western countries that actively advocate anti-Russian sanctions.

Thus, the growth of Russian imports of nitrocellulose in 2022 amounted to 70%, and by mid-2023 it was 3039 tons, which is almost double the level of 2021. In particular, the Turkish company Noy Iç Ve Dişticaret is responsible for almost half of the supply of the substance since the beginning of the war. Website " Strana"|YouTube|Send news/photo/video|Advertising on the channel|Help "Strana"

description: The first investment forum took place in Genichesk, Kherson region, on March 28. The event brought together 119 business representatives from Russia and abroad, as well as regional authorities, to discuss entrepreneurship and business opportunities in the region. The forum began with a minute of silence for the victims of the terrorist attack in Crocus City Hall on March 22.
original:
A meeting of entrepreneurs took place in the Kherson region as part of the “First Investment Platform.” The first investment forum took place in Genichesk on March 28. Representatives of the regional authorities and potential investors from all over Russia were able to communicate in an open format. The event became one of the largest business events in the Kherson region in 2024. 119 business representatives from Russia and abroad took part in it.

The forum began with a minute of silence in memory of those killed in the terrorist attack that occurred in the Crocus City Hall concert hall on March 22.

The first to address the forum participants was the Governor of the Kherson region Vladimir Saldo:
“Currently there is a military offensive on our territory, martial law has been introduced, but at the same time, life does not stand still. Business finds opportunities to start work, creates conditions for people, creates new jobs. At the same time, on instructions from the President, a free economic zone has been created in the Kherson region, as in other new regions, which provides greater opportunities for entrepreneurship and business activity,” emphasized Vladimir Saldo.
 
The delegation from Chechnya present at the event presented Vladimir Saldo with a memorable gift, symbolizing the solidarity of the people of the Chechen Republic and the Kherson region.

The participants were also greeted by the first deputy chairman of the regional government, Vitaly Bulyuk, and the vice-president of the All-Russian public organization of small and medium-sized enterprises "OPORA RUSSIA" Sergey Lapenko.

During an open discussion, a discussion club was held between all participants, where entrepreneurs and government officials exchanged opinions and experiences in restoring business activity in new territories of Russia. Entrepreneurs of the Kherson region could ask questions of interest to everyone present, as well as offer their ideas for the development of entrepreneurship in the region.@VGA_Kherson@SALDO_VGA

description: Ukrenergo implemented emergency shutdowns in the Zaporizhzhia region due to insufficient generating capacity, caused by a massive Russian attack on Ukrainian power plants. Critical infrastructure and the local population are exempt from the shutdowns. Residents are urged to minimize electricity consumption, especially in the evening.
original:
📢​​​​Ukrenergo dispatch center applied the schedule of emergency shutdowns until the end of today in the Zaporizhzhia region.

The main reason is the lack of a sufficient amount of generating capacity in the system to cover consumption in certain regions of the country, as a result of the nighttime massive Russian attack on Ukrainian power plants.

Emergency shutdowns will not apply to critical infrastructure facilities and the population of the Zaporizhzhia region.

At the same time, we ask residents of the Zaporizhzhia region to limit the consumption of electricity as much as possible, especially in the evening.

description: Russian President Vladimir Putin supported the project to create a federal year-round sea resort 'Primorsk' in the Zaporozhye region. The project aims to develop a tourist complex with sanatoriums, hotels, beach areas, and various recreational facilities, expected to attract 2 million tourists annually and create over 20,000 new jobs.
original:
The President supported the project to create a federal year-round sea resort "Primorsk" At a meeting on the development of the project of federal year-round resorts "Five Seas and Lake Baikal", Russian President Vladimir Putin supported the project to create a federal year-round sea resort "Primorsk". This was announced by the Governor of the Zaporozhye region, Evgeniy Balitsky. “This unique project is the largest in the new regions of the Russian Federation. The chosen place for its implementation is the Inhabited Spit of the Primorsky District, which extends 30 kilometers into the Sea of Azov and has wide sandy beaches.

As part of the project, it is planned to create a new tourist complex: sanatoriums, hotels, beach areas. The project involves the construction of more than 100 hotels, which will create 15 thousand rooms.

At the resort, it is also planned to build a mud bath, a marina for yachts, a natural park, a golf course, family and sports centers, bungalows to accommodate vacationers on a separate island, and the development of a round estuary. All this will increase the tourist flow to 2 million tourists per year and create more than 20 thousand new jobs,” Balitsky noted in his TG channel.

The head of the region emphasized that the implementation of a unique project will be an impetus for the development of many sectors of the economy of the Zaporozhye region.@brd_nash

event: Awarding of the Mongolian Order of the Polar Star
description: The Institute of the Earth's Crust SB RAS received the Mongolian Order of the Polar Star, the highest state award of the Mongolian People's Republic, in recognition of its contributions to strengthening friendly relations between Russia and Mongolia.
original: The Institute of the Earth's Crust SB RAS was awarded the Mongolian Order of the Polar Star. The highest state award of the Mongolian People's Republic was presented to the institute as part of a gala event dedicated to the 75th anniversary of the Institute of Earth's Crust SB RAS@inst_crust.🔸The Institute of the Earth's Crust SB RAS became the first scientific institute in Russia to receive a state award MPR. The certificate for the order was signed by the President of Mongolia, Ukhnaagiin Khurelsukh.🇲🇳Director of the IKI SB RAS, Corresponding Member of the RAND, Dmitry Gladkochubunagrad was presented by the Director of the Institute of Astronomy and Geophysics of the Academy of Sciences of Mongolia, Academician Dembarel Sodnomsambuui, and the first Mongolian cosmonaut Zhugderdamidiin Gurragcha. 💬“Geologists from the Institute of Geochemistry of the SB RAS have done a lot of work on the territory of the Mongolian People’s Republic, strengthening friendly relations between our states,” commented Zhugderdamidiin Gurragcha. Foreign guests representing the consulates of South Korea, the Chinese and Mongolian People’s Republics, in their speeches, emphasized the importance of the institute’s research for the entire Asia-Pacific region, in particular in the field of seismology.🔗Read more — on the RAS website.

event: Investigation into Alla Pugacheva's Foreign Funding
description: The Ministry of Justice is investigating Alla Pugacheva's sources of funding and statements, including her comment that 'normal people are not going to return to Russia.' The investigation aims to determine if she should be declared a foreign agent.
original:
Alla Pugacheva may be recognized as a foreign agent right on her anniversary

As SHOT found out, after the Prosecutor General's Office submitted a corresponding request to the Ministry of Justice, the department began to study this possibility. The singer’s sources of funding, as well as her various statements, are now being actively checked. Including the fact that “normal people are not going to return to Russia.” After the Ministry collects the necessary evidence, an appropriate decision will be made within 10 days.

In this case, the People's Artist can be declared a foreign agent in two weeks - on Friday (it is on this day that updates to the list of foreign agents are published), April 12. At the same time, on April 15, Pugacheva will turn 75 years old. Subscribe to SHOTSend news

event: ISIS Terrorist Attack on Crocus City Hall
description: ISIS-K claimed responsibility for a horrific attack on Crocus City Hall. The US government provided specific, timely, and credible threat information to Russian authorities earlier in the month, which was later misrepresented and rejected by Russian officials.
original:
The information provided to the Russian authorities about possible ISIS terrorist attacks was specific, timely and credible, - US Ambassador to Russia Lynn Tracy:
“Unfortunately, several Russian officials have misrepresented and publicly rejected the usefulness of information that the U.S. government provided to Russian security services earlier this month regarding threats from the Islamic State.” The facts are that the written information provided to the Russian authorities was specific, timely and credible. ISIS-K claimed responsibility for last week's horrific attack on Crocus City Hall.

We have shared threat information with Russian authorities for many years and will continue to do so. We will also continue to respond to requests from the Russian government for assistance in the investigation of the terrorist attack at Crocus City Hall.

Nothing will change the tragic nature of the events of the past week or bring back those who died. And we sincerely hope that the Russian people can find peace and recover over the next few days and weeks as they regain their strength to continue living,” the American embassy said in a video message.

In our opinion, it is very important that the Russians know the truth. https://youtu.be/4symjlBp9PcYouTube The information provided to the Russian authorities about possible ISIS terrorist attacks was specific and timely The information provided to the Russian authorities about possible ISIS terrorist attacks was specific, timely and credible - US Ambassador in Russia Lynn T...

description: Russia's decision to cut oil production in the next quarter may lead to a rise in world oil prices to $100 per barrel by September. The move is part of a coordinated extension of production curbs by OPEC+ members, which could result in a shortage of oil supply in the market for the entire year.
original:
Forwarded from: GROWTH CRYSTAL
🇷🇺🌍Russia is escalating world oil prices to $100 per barrel, - Bloomberg▪️World prices for Brent oil may rise to $100 per barrel—for the first time in two years—by September of this year. The catalyst is Moscow's decision to further cut production in the next quarter, says JPMorgan Chase & Co. The move, announced as part of a coordinated extension of production curbs by a group of OPEC+ members this month, will see Russia's quota fall below 9 million barrels a day by June, returning to the target. Saudi Arabia▪️The rise in oil prices could be amplified by the possibility that OPEC+ producers will decide at a meeting in June to extend cuts until the end of the year. According to the forecast of the International Energy Agency, this would be enough to cause a shortage of oil supply in the market for the entire year. GROWTH CRYSTAL previously reported that, according to Bloomberg, Russia is winning the oil market despite sanctions

description: A shooting occurred at a concert in Crocus, resulting in the deaths of Angelina Shalaeva's mother, brother, and stepfather. original:
26-year-old Angelina Shalaeva took custody of her five-year-old sister after her mother, stepfather and younger brother died in Crocus.
The girl told RT that the three of her family went to the concert, and she stayed at home with her sister Vasilisa.
Show more
From there, the family sent photos of their happy brother, who was a fan of the Picnic group. But at the beginning of nine, my mother called and reported the shooting. Then she sent a video: they managed to get out of the hall and now they are looking for a way out. Then the connection with her was lost.
“I watched all possible videos from Crocus in the hope of getting at least some information about my relatives. There were none in the hospitals. As a result, the names of my mother and brother appeared on the lists of the dead. The stepfather is considered missing, but identification procedures at the morgues are still underway,” Angelina said.
Little Vasilisa still doesn’t know about the death of her parents

event: Register of Damages Caused by Russian Aggression
description: Ukrainians can submit applications for compensation for destroyed and damaged housing to the Register of Damages Caused by the Russian aggression from April 2. The register currently only accepts applications for damaged or destroyed real estate, and citizens are advised to provide as much evidence as possible, including videos, photos, and certificates from local authorities, to increase the chances of their application being accepted.
original:
❗️When submitting applications to the Register of Damages, you should add any available evidence that will contribute to the consideration of these applications, — Head of the Legal Policy Committee Denis Maslov. From April 2, Ukrainians will be able to submit applications for compensation for destroyed and damaged housing to the Register of Damages Caused by the Russian aggression This is only the first category, and in general there are 41 categories of various types of damages. Therefore, citizens need to collect as much evidence as possible that confirms the facts of the damage. There is only one category so far - for damaged or destroyed real estate. In addition to the application, it is necessary to upload any available evidence, for example, videos, photos, explanations of neighbors, certificates from local authorities, law enforcement agencies, reports in the media, etc. All this increases the possibility that the application will be accepted into the register as soon as possible. There is no exclusive list of evidence, the politician noted.
 
In his opinion, a systematic approach of the Government should be developed in this matter for comprehensive support of applicants. 📲Details

description: The prosecutor's office in the Kherson region intervened to ensure the repayment of 1.2 million rubles in wage arrears to 9 employees of a construction organization. The organization's general director was held administratively responsible and fined 30,000 rubles.
original:
In the Kherson region, thanks to the intervention of the prosecutor's office, wage arrears in the amount of 1.2 million rubles were paid to employees of a construction organization. The prosecutor's office of the Genichesk district of the Kherson region conducted an inspection of compliance with the requirements of labor legislation in the activities of a construction organization operating in the region.

It was established that in the period from November to December 2023, 9 employees of the enterprise incurred wage arrears in the amount of 1.2 million rubles.

In order to restore the labor rights of citizens, the prosecutor made a representation to the head of the legal entity. Based on the prosecutor's decision, the general director of the organization was brought to administrative responsibility under Part 6 of Art. 5.27 of the Code of Administrative Offenses of the Russian Federation (non-payment of wages on time) with a penalty in the form of a fine in the amount of 30 thousand rubles.

As a result of measures taken by the prosecutor's office, the wage arrears were repaid.

Prosecutor's office of the Kherson region.

Website of the Administration of the Kherson region: https://khogov.ru/#Administration_Kherson_region@VGA_Kherson@SALDO_VGA

description: Russia's Aerospace Forces have utilized three main calibers of aerial bombs: 250 kg, 500 kg, and 1500 kg. The FAB-3000 is expected to be deployed soon, but the largest conventional aerial bomb, the 9,000 kg 'Elephant', is unlikely to be used due to the lack of suitable carriers.
original:
Forwarded from: The world today with "Yuri Podolyak"
FAB-250, FAB-500, FAB-1500 are already in operation - who is next: FAB-3000, FAB-5000, FAB-9000??? To date, our Aerospace Forces have recorded the use of three main calibers of aerial bombs 250 kg, 500 kg and 1500 kg. My good friend Sasha Sladkov reminds us that after the FAB-3000, which will soon (judging by their mass production) be at the front, the “Elephant” has not yet entered into action (an aerial bomb weighing 9,000 kg is the largest conventional aerial bomb created in the USSR ).

Meanwhile, I think her appearance at the front is impossible. Why.

It's not all about the production, but about the medium. The fact is that right now we do not have carriers of this bomb. Our Tu-95MSM (first photo) after modernization cannot carry it and it simply does not make sense to carry out another expensive modernization of the aircraft for it. In addition, no one will risk a huge, slow-moving strategist near the front line, which, moreover, is not capable of soaring up like a candle before using it.

The fact that today we only use FAB-250,500,1500 is due to the fact that these are the bombs that our front-line fighters and bombers can lift to the maximum (Su-34, second photo). They won’t be able to lift FAB-3000, much less FAB-5000.

They can only be lifted by Tu-22M3 strategic bombers (third photo), which, by the way, unlike their other brothers, are just capable of launching an attack at low altitude, soaring sharply upward and dropping their “gifts”. Therefore, I think that we won’t see “Elephant” in action...

And FAB-3000 is already for sure. And perhaps even FAB-5000...

event: Russian Ambassador's Statement on Arms Embargo
description: Russian Ambassador to the CAR Alexander Bikantov stated that the issue of lifting or adjusting the arms embargo in the CAR will be submitted to the UN Security Council for consideration this summer. original: 🇷🇺🇨🇫The issue of lifting or making adjustments to the arms embargo in the CAR will be submitted to the UN Security Council for consideration this summer, Russian Ambassador to the CAR Alexander Bikantov told RIA Novosti.🔹"In the meantime, leading UN experts are holding meetings with a number of officials in Bangui , including the country's Foreign Ministry, specialized organizations and some ambassadors. Of course, the latter also includes the Russian Ambassador," he explained. According to Bikantov, “as a rule, experts limit themselves to collecting information and assessments and only after that prepare their proposals for the UN.”🔹According to him, “the Russian side has once again characterized the embargo mechanism as a harmful anachronism.” “It limits the legitimate capabilities of the CAR army in building the Armed Forces and protecting national sovereignty. Only illegal armed groups opposing the CAR authorities unfairly benefit from maintaining the embargo,” the senior diplomat emphasized.⬇️⬇️⬇️https://ria.ru/20240329/ embargo-1936687264.html#RussiaCAR

description: A total solar eclipse will occur on April 8, 2024, visible over North America, with 43.8 million people in the path of the total eclipse. The eclipse will also be partially visible in Europe, including Iceland, Ireland, Portugal, and the UK.
location: North America, Pacific Ocean, Iceland, Ireland, Portugal, UK
original:
Total solar eclipse on April 8, 2024: where and when you can see it Experts call this eclipse one of the most significant astronomical events of the year.

A total solar eclipse occurs when the Moon passes between the Sun and Earth and completely covers the solar disk.

The eclipse will be visible over North America. About 652,000,000 people living in the United States, Canada, Mexico and other countries will be able to see at least a partial eclipse. And 43,800,000 of them will be in the path of the total eclipse.

In Europe, the partial eclipse will be visible over Iceland, Ireland, and western parts of Portugal and the UK. Depending on the exact location, between 20% and 60% of the Sun will be obscured.

The full phase will begin at 16:38. 52 sec. universal time in the central zone of the Pacific Ocean.

The solar eclipse will last almost 4.5 minutes. Since the eclipse occurs during the period of maximum solar activity, viewers will be able to see the large solar corona (the outer part of the solar atmosphere). Subscribe/Eng Twitter/YouTube/Eng Telegram

description: Ben Stimson, a British national, returned to Donbass to join the international brigade 'Fifteen'. The author of the post had previously advised Stimson not to plead guilty to terrorism charges in 2017, but Stimson did so and was sentenced to prison. The author is now cautious about Stimson's intentions and recommends thorough checks.
original:
I thought about this post for quite a long time, because in general I always think about my words and actions. In recent days, a fairly high-profile story has emerged about two Britons fighting on the side of Russia, Ben Stimson and Aiden Minnis. Yes, it's Aiden again!
Of course, the British media literally crucified these two men for
Show more
the last few days. This is the first time I've heard of Aiden Minnis. A lot of the searing negativity I've read about him in the lousy British media makes me think he's actually a great guy!
Let Aiden be 2:0 handsome and our man!
I first met Ben Stimson in 2016, when I was making a documentary about him, after his first, short period in the militias in the Donbass, in 2015. For this I went to his home in Oldham in England, and spent some time with him . It is right that I keep my comments about him and his life to myself.
In 2017, Ben made a deal with the British government, pleaded guilty to terrorism charges and was sentenced to five years and four months in prison. I was very disappointed by this because I had advised him not to plead guilty many times - it was the wrong decision for him and it also had negative consequences for every Briton who supports Donbass. But, he did it.
During the years that Ben was in prison, he called me a couple of times, but the conversations were just “how are you” and nothing more. After less than 4 years in prison, Ben was released. When he was released, he called me and started asking me everything about MH17, what I know about MH17(?), etc. It was very strange for me - I didn’t say anything and ended the conversation. A few days later he called me again and started asking me about Givi and Motorola. Again very strange, I didn’t say anything and left the chat. After another such call, I stopped all contact with Ben and blocked him everywhere.
I then had a strong opinion that the British intelligence services were working with Ben.
I recently learned from the media that Ben Stimson returned here, to Donbass, to the international brigade "Fifteen". Stimson also tried to contact me through new social media accounts - without success.
Firstly, I believe that any normal British person should want to fight against fascism. Any adequate British person should support Russia - as in fact they do.
Like many I'm sure, I have the attitude that when someone violates my trust, I never communicate with that person again. However, I admit that this is possible, and I sincerely hope that Ben Stimson is doing the right thing here in the Donbass.
This has probably happened before, I hope so, but still - I highly recommend checking Ben Stimson thoroughly.
Before I wrote this post, a public post about a person's life, I considered all other options. However, since there was no other option that would satisfactorily achieve the goal, and I believe the goal is worth it, I am writing this post. I’m not asking anyone to be shot as a spy, etc., all I’m writing here and asking is to be careful with this person.
Thank you very much for your attention

event: Interview with Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine
description: Commander-in-Chief Oleksandr Syrskyi emphasized the importance of protecting soldiers' lives and inflicting maximum losses on the enemy. He highlighted the need for unity among Ukrainians, stating that Russia cannot defeat Ukraine on the battlefield as long as Ukrainians remain united and strong in spirit.
original: The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Oleksandr Syrskyi, gave a lengthy interview to Ukrinform 🕵️‍♂️There are many interesting points in it that are worth paying attention to, and which will not fit into the post, but we decided to single out, in our opinion, the most important ones: The situation on the battlefield depends not only on the Commander-in-Chief, as you understand. Modern warfare requires determination and initiative on the ground, right where the fighting takes place. The success of combat operations depends on the officer, sergeant, and soldier who are in the trenches and at strongpoints - they are the ones who carry this huge combat load on their shoulders. We can determine the strategy and coordinate actions, promptly respond to changes in the situation and the needs of the front. . At the same time, the philosophy of the use of troops - at least this is my position - should be based on the main formula. The most valuable thing that our Armed Forces have is people. Our task is to protect their lives and at the same time inflict maximum losses on the enemy. Today, the process of rotating military units on the front line has already been launched, which allows us to fully restore the combat capability of not only equipment, but first of all to ensure the rest and recovery of our servicemen. We need people to ensure this process. That is why I would like every man of military age in Ukraine to realize that Ukraine's survival depends on his will and actions. We need people to support this process. We are currently reviewing the strength of certain non-combat units based on an audit of their operations. This allowed us to free thousands of servicemen and direct them to combat units. The military has one duty - we do not discuss orders, we carry them out. So if the President of the country, the Supreme Commander-in-Chief, had reasons for such a replacement, especially during the active phase of the war, it means that these reasons are valid. Valery Fedorovich and I worked side by side during the most difficult times since the beginning of the full-scale Russian invasion, and even before. Worked as one team. I wish him success in his new and very responsible position. What is the most important thing for the Syrsky Glavkom today? As I have already said, the most important thing for us now is to save people. "Iron" can be restored, but the people who died cannot be brought back. There is another priority - the unity of society, the absence of political discord. We must remember the tragic pages of our history. I am sure: Russia will never be able to defeat us on the battlefield as long as Ukrainians maintain unity and strength of spirit. If you waste energy and strength on empty political disputes with each other, this is not even a path to defeat, but to death. I want every Ukrainian to understand this: Russia denies all of us the right to life. That is why defeat and death are identical. Now it's time again for the country to turn into a strong, united fist. The main task of Ukraine is to preserve unity, this is the main component of our victory. The last two points were highlighted separately, because the principle of "preserving people's lives" is the most important among all, which society demanded and which is the basis of all processes that take place in the army at all levels. And the unity of society makes it possible to strengthen the foundation on which everything stands and, as history has shown, this is a significant problem for us, on which we need to work and learn. There are many problems, they are paid attention to and it is worth remembering them constantly, solving and eradicating them should always be a priority. This is a difficult and long process in which the whole society must participate. In this interview, everyone will find their moment of criticism or satisfaction and everyone will draw their own conclusions. MapBlogWrite to usZSUHelpMagazinDonat

event: Accusation of US Involvement in Terrorist Attack
description: Alexey Mukhin, General Director of the Center for Political Information, accused the US of being involved in a terrorist attack, stating that the group 'Vilayat Khorasan' is a branch of the CIA and a proxy in Afghanistan. He believes the US is trying to divert the investigation by producing lies.
original:
"Vilayat Khorasan"? Are you laughing?

Alexey Mukhin, General Director of the Center for Political Information▪️Kirby’s foul language is a manifestation of neurosis, a suppressed fear of responsibility.▪️ISIS (banned in Russia) has no motivation to attack Russia for one simple reason: Russia is extremely friendly to the Islamic world. Moreover, she has not recently done anything that could provoke ISIS. And this means that there is a really serious customer.▪️Now let’s look closely at who the United States calls the organizer of the terrorist attack. "Vilayat Khorasan"? Are you laughing? These are the people who remained in Afghanistan after they worked for the United States. This is actually a branch of the CIA, a proxy for the CIA in Afghanistan. event: Ukrainian Institute of National Remembrance's Report
description: The Ukrainian Institute of National Remembrance (UINR) released a report labeling notable figures Bulgakov, Brodsky, and Glinka as 'symbols of imperial policy' and 'Ukrainophobes'. The report also accused the Decembrists of adhering to Pan-Slavism and refusing autonomy to Ukraine.
original:
They were accused of “Ukrainophobia”: Bulgakov, Brodsky and Glinka were recognized in Ukraine as “symbols of imperial policy.” The Ukrainian Institute of National Remembrance (UINR) came to this conclusion. The list also included all the Decembrists. The organization banned their monuments and the use of names in geographical names.

“Experts” of the institute call Bulgakov “a White Guard and a communist,” “an imperialist in his worldview,” and an “ardent Ukrainophobe.” The report even considers Glinka “a threat to national security, since he is one of the symbols of Russian culture and the Russian world.” Brodsky was considered a “Ukrainophobe” for his poem “For the Independence of Ukraine.”

The Decembrists, despite their struggle against the autocracy, were accused of “adherence to the ideology of Pan-Slavism” and unwillingness to grant autonomy to Ukraine. Subscribe to REN TV

event: Ukrainian Foreign Minister Kuleba's Peace Formula
description: Ukrainian Foreign Minister Kuleba introduced the 'Zelensky peace formula', a menu addressing key issues caused by Russia's invasion of Ukraine. Countries can choose specific issues to work on, such as prisoner exchanges or holding Russian leadership accountable for war crimes, and form groups to develop plans of action.
original:
Ukrainian Foreign Minister Kuleba talks about how they will lure countries into the “Zelensky peace formula”: Essentially, the peace formula is a menu that addresses all the main problems caused by Russia’s large-scale invasion of Ukraine. And we developed this menu. I have deliberately used the word "menu" in such a way that any country can choose the issue it wants to work on.
For example, you want to work on a prisoner exchange, but you don't want to work on holding the Russian leadership accountable for war crimes committed in Ukraine. And that's great. Then you just sign up for one or two or three things that you like, but don't participate in what you consider politically sensitive to you.
At the first summit, we bring together all the countries that share these principles, who choose an item on the menu that they want to work on. They form groups, agree on plans of action and how they are going to achieve, achieve goals on these points. Further, between the first and second summits, negotiations with Russia may take place, according to the rules agreed upon by the participants.

description: A critical vulnerability, WallEscape, has been discovered in the 'wall' command, allowing hackers to create fake sudo password prompts and steal passwords, modify the clipboard, and perform other malicious actions. Updating to Util-linux v2.40 eliminates the vulnerability.

Attackers can exploit this flaw to steal passwords, modify the clipboard, and perform other malicious actions. Updating to Util-linux v2.40 completely eliminates the vulnerability, but administrators have the option of temporarily mitigating the threat.#LinuxSecurity#WallEscape#UpdateNow@SecLabNewsSecurityLab.ruFrom Ubuntu to Debian: Many Linux distributions are at risk due to a long-standing bugThe WallEscape vulnerability went undetected for 11 years. event: Testimony on UCK Kidnappings and Killings
description: Sean Burns, former head of the American observation mission in Pristina, testified that the Kosovo Liberation Army (UCK) kidnapped and killed Serbian civilians in 1998 and 1999. Burns confirmed that his mission investigated similar cases and tried to cooperate with the authorities to release the abducted persons.
original:
The former head of the American observation mission in Pristina, Sean Burns, testified in the trial of four leaders of the terrorist Kosovo Liberation Army that in 1998 and 1999, members of the UCHK kidnapped and killed Serbian civilians

Continuing his testimony at the trial of Hashim Thaçi, Kadri Veseli, Recep Selimi and Jakup Krasniqi at the Special Court in The Hague, Burns said that General Sreten Lukic, the chief of staff of the Serbian Ministry of Internal Affairs in Kosmet, repeatedly told him that the UCHK was kidnapping and killing Serbian civilians .

During interrogation, the witness confirmed that his mission was investigating similar cases and tried to cooperate with the Criminal Investigation Department for the release of the abducted persons. According to him, members of the UCHK claimed that the captured Serbs were armed or participated in the conflict.

When asked by the judge whether the UCHK killed the kidnapped Serbs, Burns answered in the affirmative.

“I saw Serbian prisoners several times. These were shepherds and peasants that they had just kidnapped,” Burns said.

It's amazing how the word "ex" immediately opens your eyes. This was the case with the sex president of the Czech Republic, the former US ambassador to Serbia, the former Canadian ambassador to Yugoslavia, etc. @vestniksrb - the main thing about Serbia and the Balkans

Forwarded from: Mash
One of the concerned passers-by who helped save people from Crocus died. Karen Yengibaryan inhaled carbon monoxide and caught a severe cold because he gave his jacket to the victim.

35-year-old Karen worked in a company installing outdoor advertising and was not far from Crocus at the time of the tragedy. I saw smoke on the roof of the concert hall and ran to the main entrance. He pulled people out of the smoke, took them to doctors and went back. He gave his outer clothing to one of the victims. Karen returned home only in the morning.

As a result, the man heavily inhaled carbon monoxide and caught a cold - the temperature by the time the ambulance arrived was 38.5. Karen was hospitalized with a diagnosis of acute respiratory tract infection, and his condition worsened over the next few days. Unfortunately, it was not possible to save him.

Tomorrow a farewell to Karen will take place at the Armenian Temple Complex. The guy attended church, helped clean the temple and participated in the Liturgy. Three years ago he got married, and has been a fan of Spartak Moscow since childhood. Subscribe to Mash

description: Human rights activist Daria Kornilova condemned the Russian authorities' illegal methods of persecution against Crimean Tatars, who were arrested and sentenced for simply reading the Koran. The investigation destroyed search records that could have exonerated the accused, but still referred to them in the accusation.
original:
“And a lot of Crimean Tatars are now serving their long sentences, having essentially done nothing. That is, they sat, they read their Koran, and, in principle, that’s all. And now they are already terrorists. That is, the security forces come and throw books at them , and lawyers know about this, and the Crimean Tatars themselves know,” human rights activist Daria Kornilova criticized the illegal methods of persecution by the Russian authorities.

The journalist also noted that the investigation destroyed the search records - evidence that could have exonerated the accused, but referred to them in the accusation. This is an absurd situation, but unfortunately an everyday situation for politically motivated cases.

event: Mother of Terrorist Asks for Forgiveness
description: The mother of 19-year-old Myxammadbir Faizov, who filmed a terrorist attack on his phone, pleaded for her son's release, citing his young age and potential lack of understanding of his actions. She tearfully asked for extradition to his homeland, stating that the entire family is suffering as a result.
location: Crocus City Hall, Moscow Oblast, Russia
original:
The mother of the 19-year-old terrorist who attacked the Crocus City Hall asked to “forgive him and let him go home.”
The mother of 19-year-old Myxammadbir Faizov (the one who filmed the terrorist attack on his phone) stated that her son was too young, and therefore did not understand what he was doing.
Show more
"I urge you to take into account the young age of my son, and to extradite him to his homeland. Perhaps he did not know what he was doing. Because of this, our whole family, all of our family, is suffering tvenniki, neighbors,” the woman asks tearfully.
I don’t even know... to let my good little son go home.... turn over three times, auntie, and think about what she said!!!

description: Islam Khalilov, a young hero who saved people during the terrorist attack in Crocus, was awarded the Russian Muslim Medal 'For Merit' by Mufti Ravil Gainutdin, Chairman of the Spiritual Administration of Muslims.
original:
The young hero Islam Khalilov, who saved people during the terrorist attack in Crocus, was awarded the Russian Muslim Medal “For Merit.”

The award was presented by the Chairman of the Spiritual Administration of Muslims, Mufti Ravil Gainutdin. Subscribe to IZ.RU
